name: BATTLE PART
description:
The game will focus on direct combat with the bosses Choose your vehicle and enter the challenge, Each challenge presents an enemy in a different style Avoid enemy attacks and destroy the enemy.





choose one of five different vehicles Each vehicle will have different attacks






You will fight each boss in a different arena.
Each boss will have a unique style, different attacks and will change his attacks according to your progress in the stage
When you defeat a boss, you will unlock other bosses
You will need to defeat all the bosses to finish the game.
